name: Hexagon Xperion GmbH
memberOrga: Hexagon Xperion is a member of NGVA Europe
goal: Hexagon Xperion, a Hexagon Composites company, develops, produces and distributes composite high-pressure vessels (Type 4) for installation into vehicles, for storage as well as for transportation of compressed natural gas and hydrogen. Our competitiveness is founded on our values-based performance culture, with a strong commitment to transparency and continuous technological improvement. Hexagon Xperion aims to be a leading supplier of innovative composite solutions that positively impacts the environment.
interests: Climate Action, Energy, Enterprise, Environment, Regional Policy, Research and Technology, Taxation, Trans-European Networks, Transport
euInitiatives: Hexagon Xperion monitors and participates in the activities related to the following subjects: Clean Energy Package, Clean Mobility Package, Renewable Energy, Taxation, Emission Standards.
